name: 341 Officer
description:
You started your new job as a police officer with a dispatcher role. You will be receiving calls, and messages some are urgent, and some are not urgent, or jokes calls/ messages. You need to do your best to keep the city safe or to save people from being suicide, etc. Good luck!  

Disclaimer:

This game may contain some sensitive text.

Credits: 

Game by: MS ANNOTATION X

(This game is a prototype made within 7 hours)

Any feedback, I appreciate!
